meanings.definition: The business of providing food and drink for a social event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: The catering at the party was excellent.
meanings.sent2: We hired a catering service for the wedding reception.
meanings.sent3: The catering company accidentally brought too many desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for catering to different tastes made her popular.
meanings.sent5: The catering staff worked tirelessly to ensure everyone was satisfied.

meanings.definition: The act of providing food and drink for an event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy catering for family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The catering for the conference was well organized.
meanings.sent3: His idea of catering for the picnic was to bring only chips.
meanings.sent4: She approached the task of catering with creativity and flair.
meanings.sent5: The catering of the buffet was a feast for the eyes as well as the stomach.
